channel.title: [REL]Gauntlets
channel.description:
This model was requested by somebody on R-S, and I'd never made gloves, so I made an attempt at it. I think they turned out pretty good, but I wanted other opinions on it, so I decided to make a new thread for it.
[i][b]Wire-frame:[/b][/i] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1839891/gauntlet_wireframe.bmp[/img] [i][b]In-hand render:[/b][/i] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1839892/d3rkb0w13_request.bmp[/img] [b][url=http://"http://www.upload.ee/files/1836867/d3rkb0w13_request.rar.html"]DOWNLOAD_LINK[/url][/b]

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“ravens, post:17, topic:423006”]did you even read what i said? its not about modeling or modeling skills… i am saying you should try modeling something more unique
edit: not really unique, just more visually appealing and realistic. for example i would change the colors on the one to start.
and i agree i have not posted any good models here, but to be fair i could say the same for you. i think you should re-read what i said it was not meant to be offensive at all.[/quote]
Touche

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

did you even read what i said? its not about modeling or modeling skills… i am saying you should try modeling something more unique
edit: not really unique, just more visually appealing and realistic. for example i would change the colors on the one to start.
and i agree i have not posted any good models here, but to be fair i could say the same for you. i think you should re-read what i said it was not meant to be offensive at all.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

The wireframe wasn’t uploaded for you then. I don’t want to sound like a dick, but it seems like, in all of your comments, you are trying to push yourself above me, and make yourself feel so much better than me. I’d like to take your criticism, but I’m yet to see a good model from you. This being said without trying to insult, or disrespect you. Just how I feel.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

i don’t care about the wireframe or any BS, but i think you need better ideas of what to model. try Google concept art or something, because i really don’t like the outcomes of these models
i know you did this for some request, and yeah i cant find a problem with the wire-frame, but if the end result doesn’t look good that’s more important than all the other crap
im not saying you aren’t a good modeler or whatever, just focus on the end result more and find something better to model

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

I’ll make an attempt at a gun, and upload it then.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:5, topic:423006”][quote author=Im_Mad_1337 link=topic=525669.msg3827581#msg3827581 date=1322319388]

You don’t need the fingers for an RSPS, if you haven’t noticed they do not have them on the original model. you could have just modelled around the fist from the RS char and then added your claws on them, alot simpler then making fingers.
[/quote] The guy that requested it wanted it with fingers and claws. Honestly, anything that I post here that somebody requested, is not my concept.

Well, how about you make your own models with your own consept? Just because one person wants it that specific way doesn’t mean others do, so work on your own models and post them. These models you’ve been making for these people look, i don’t mean to be rude, but they look horrible. The colours don’t complerely go together and the models are just plain and gauntlets with claws have been made so many times before. So just make your own models and release them, something you’re happy with and that others will enjoy too.[/quote]

“Consept”

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Im_Mad_1337:

Didn’t want to make this a pissing contest… If you’re better than me, that’s fine, I won’t argue with it.

I never said i was better, i was stating what i do. I’ve yet to see you post a model you made for yourself though, care to share one?

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

Didn’t want to make this a pissing contest… If you’re better than me, that’s fine, I won’t argue with it.

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:8, topic:423006”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=525669.msg3827670#msg3827670 date=1322325848]
Well, how about you make your own models with your own consept? Just because one person wants it that specific way doesn’t mean others do, so work on your own models and post them. These models you’ve been making for these people look, i don’t mean to be rude, but they look horrible. The colours don’t complerely go together and the models are just plain and gauntlets with claws have been made so many times before. So just make your own models and release them, something you’re happy with and that others will enjoy too.
[/quote]
It really isn’t that bad of a model. The colors don’t match that well, but that is what the image sort of looked like. And if someone ever requests me to make a model I do it how they want it, for they are the client. I don’t make it and say well that’s too bad it was a bad idea anyways. That’s insulting them.

Also amy, concept is the artists choice. Not everyone is going to have the same choice as you, no need to be so harsh over concept. It really is a decent model, and doing the fingers challenges him to make something of a higher difficulty. Not really a bad thing…[/quote]
As a modeller, who would know better about the models, they should atleast advise they chose different colours or even a few changes to save polys. I think the model could have been done better, but thats just me. Everytime someone has requested a model from me which doesn’t look that appealing i try and convince them they could do better by lets say, changing the colours or a few adjustments. It could just be me, but i try to achieve the best for someone i model for.

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

Thanks Wanderer <3

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

amy_webb:

Well, how about you make your own models with your own consept? Just because one person wants it that specific way doesn’t mean others do, so work on your own models and post them. These models you’ve been making for these people look, i don’t mean to be rude, but they look horrible. The colours don’t complerely go together and the models are just plain and gauntlets with claws have been made so many times before. So just make your own models and release them, something you’re happy with and that others will enjoy too.

It really isn’t that bad of a model. The colors don’t match that well, but that is what the image sort of looked like. And if someone ever requests me to make a model I do it how they want it, for they are the client. I don’t make it and say well that’s too bad it was a bad idea anyways. That’s insulting them.

Also amy, concept is the artists choice. Not everyone is going to have the same choice as you, no need to be so harsh over concept. It really is a decent model, and doing the fingers challenges him to make something of a higher difficulty. Not really a bad thing…

Read full topic

item.title: [REL]Gauntlets
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Im_Mad_1337, post:6, topic:423006”]It’s not like I only make models that people request, I do make models of my own, I just felt like releasing this here.

Edit: Could you tell me what looks horrible about my models, so I know what to improve on? :\ Right when I feel like I’m getting better, I’m obviously not.[/quote]
Post on of YOUR models and i’ll tell you where you need improving.

[/quote]
